Class WaferMapPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.plot.Plot

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, AnnotationChangeListener, AxisChangeListener, MarkerChangeListener, RendererChangeListener, LegendItemSource, DatasetChangeListener, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable

    public class WaferMapPlot
extends Plot
implements RendererChangeListener, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
